question.title: Print Diagonal
question.content:
Given a 2D matrix, print all elements of the given matrix in diagonal order.

See the sample input.

Input format :
Line 1 : Number of rows R and cols C in the matrix
Line 2 : RXC elements of the matrix separated by space
Output Format :
 Print the diagonals
Constraints :
 1 <= R <= 10^3
 1 <= C <= 10^3
Sample Input :
3 4
8 3 0 7 
0 3 1 8 
3 9 8 7
Sample Output :
8 
0 3 
3 3 0 
9 1 7 
8 8 
7

rephrased.body: Given a 2D matrix, traverse and print its elements in diagonal order. This means printing elements along diagonals from top-left to bottom-right, starting from the top-left corner and moving towards the bottom-right corner.
constraints: 1 <= R <= 10^3 (R represents the number of rows)
1 <= C <= 10^3 (C represents the number of columns)
